author: timbeiko
content: This is super cool <@!743395542196944977> ! Just played with it a bit. Will add it to the 1559 resource list

author: perama
content:
I pushed a new feature: press `b` to send transactions with ``price==basefee``. 

I also reduced the amount of transactions per press to ``30``, which allows you to titrate conditions in a more refined way.

author: perama
content:
I have also taken screenshots of some patterns that I have encountered, and added short descriptions for what they might represent:

https://github.com/perama-v/gidget-gadget/blob/main/musings.md
